author: Liturgist
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
1. Install
2. Update-Help
3. Get-Help about_Comment_Based_Help

Expected behavior
-----------------
Help information appears

Actual behavior
---------------
Two identically named topics appear.
No help content appears.

```
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-beta.1> help about_Comment_Based_Help
Name                              Category  Module                    Synopsis
----                              --------  ------                    --------
about_Comment_Based_Help          HelpFile                            Describes how to write comment-based help topi...
about_Comment_Based_Help          HelpFile                            Describes how to write comment-based 
help topi...


PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-beta.1> help about_Comment_Based_Help -Full
Name                              Category  Module                    Synopsis
----                              --------  ------                    --------
about_Comment_Based_Help          HelpFile                            Describes how to write comment-based help topi...
about_Comment_Based_Help          HelpFile                            Describes how to write comment-based help topi...
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-beta.1> help about_Comment_Based_Help -Online
Get-Help : Multiple Help topics were found. Use only one Help topic with the -Online option.
At line:55 char:5
+     Get-Help @PSBoundParameters | more
+     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (:) [Get-Help], PSInvalidOperationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : InvalidOperation,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetHelpCommand

```
Environment data
----------------
```
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-beta.1> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta
PSEdition                      Core
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
CLRVersion
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.15063
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@liturgist Thanks for your report!
It is duplicate #3782 and #2565

title: Double help issues
